sentences.en: And, even with this terror in his heart, he could hardly avoid laughing, to imagine how the sanctified old patriarchal deacon would have been petrified by his minister's impiety.
sentences.cn: 然而，尽管他内心如此惧怕，但一想到假着他当真说出那番大不敬的话来，那位圣洁的父辈老执事会吓得何等瞠目结舌，他还是禁不住要笑出声来！

sentences.en: Charles Dixon Deacon is the dean of admissions at Georgetown University in Washington, D . C .
sentences.cn: CharlesDeacon是华盛顿 特区 乔治敦大学入学处的主任.

sentences.en: Deacon Chee Meng transcribes the Sunday Service Message every week, and many have benefitted from it.
sentences.cn: 李志明执事为每个主日信息所预备的抄本使许多弟兄姐妹们受惠.

sentences.en: Deacon made no secret of his loathing of Bayldon.
sentences.cn: 迪肯毫不掩饰自己对贝尔顿的憎恶。

sentences.en: Deacon says the most common reason is to have a chance to travel.
sentences.cn: Deacon先生说最普遍的理由是可以有机会去旅游.

sentences.en: He had been ordained as a deacon in the Roman Catholic Church.
sentences.cn: 他被任命为天主教的助祭。

sentences.en: I caught up with Coburn, a medical doctor and ordained Southern Baptist deacon.
sentences.cn: 我约见了科伯恩，他是一位医学博士，也是南部浸礼会执事。

sentences.en: I want to find a a language partner teach me deacon english.
sentences.cn: 我想找一位外国朋友带我读英语文章.

sentences.en: Is strictly rational and sea deacon of the company of double standards.
sentences.cn: 严格与理智是海荣公司执事的双重标准.

sentences.en: James Murphy, deacon of the diocese's mother church, the Cathedral of the Blessed Sacrament, said church leaders are always skeptical at first.
sentences.cn: 主教教区的天主教大教堂执事詹姆斯·墨菲说，教堂的负责人一开始都对此持怀疑态度。

sentences.en: Mister Deacon says the most common reason is to have a chance to travel.
sentences.cn: 先生称,最常见的原因是有机会旅行.

sentences.en: So Deacon So - and - So can get a new Benz?
sentences.cn: 那些管事的人可以买一辆新的奔驰?

sentences.en: There also exist some relationships of conversion between the formulas of Deacon and Jacobs.
sentences.cn: Deacon式估算结果与Jacobs式估算结果之间也有一定的转换关系.

trans.tran_cn: [宗]（新教，长老会等的）执事，（希腊教会的）助祭，〈英〉工会会长，〈美〉初生小牛
trans.tran_en: a religious official, in some Christian churches, who is just below the rank of a priest
